description:
Connally was an Alliance rear admiral and vice commander of the 12th Fleet.
When the 12th fleet was practically annihilated by http://anidb.net/ch189 [Lutz] at the Borsorn System prior to the Battle of Amritsar Starzone, he took command after http://anidb.net/ch778 [Borodin]`s suicide and surrendered to Lutz.
name: Connally
